cancel.title: Cancel subscription
cancel.warning: This action is irreversible. Your connection will be terminated.
cancel.effect1: All associated services will be deleted
cancel.effect2: Your phone number will be lost
cancel.effect3: The modem must be returned within 15 days
cancel.confirmHint: Type the word above to confirm

move.title: Move connection
move.description: Fill in your new address to request a move.
move.info: An eligibility check will be performed at the new address.
move.errorRequired: Street, zip code and city are required

alert.hintBoth: Email for email alerts, phone for SMS

dhcp.title: DHCP Configuration
dhcp.enableHint: When disabled, devices will need manual IP configuration.
dhcp.leaseHint: Duration for which the IP is reserved for a device.
dhcp.dnsHint: Leave OVHcloud defaults or use custom DNS servers.

modemDeclare.title: Declare Personal Modem
modemDeclare.warningText: By using your own modem, OVHcloud technical support is limited. You are responsible for configuring and troubleshooting your equipment.
modemDeclare.macHint: WAN interface MAC address (on the modem label).

wifi.title: WiFi Configuration {{band}}
wifi.ssidHint: 1 to 32 characters. Visible name of your network.
wifi.passwordHint: 8 to 63 characters. Mix letters, numbers and symbols.
wifi.channelHint: Auto is recommended. Change only if interference issues.

optionAdd.title: Add an Option
optionAdd.description: Select an option to add to your subscription.
optionAdd.noOptions: No options available for this connection.
optionAdd.monthlyNote: This option will be billed monthly with your subscription.
optionAdd.oneTimeNote: This option will be billed once.

errors.subscribeFailed: Failed to subscribe to this option

alertDelete.title: Delete alert
alertDelete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?

migrate.title: Migrate to a new offer
migrate.noOffers: No migration offers available for this connection.
migrate.warningText: The migration will take effect on the next billing date. A brief service interruption is possible.
migrate.confirmCheckbox: I understand and accept the migration conditions
migrate.effectiveDate: Takes effect on next billing period.
